description: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada’s Guelph Research and Development Centre requires the supply, delivery, installation, and training of one new Benchtop Pulsed Light System for the use in food safety research and development to determine in a safe and controlled manner the energy levels required to inactivate microorganism deposited on different surfaces.

### Solicitation Details

* Tender Type: Request for Proposal (RFP) - Competitive, Open Bidding
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (Canada)
* End-User: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (Guelph Research and Development Centre)
* Procurement Category: Goods (GD)
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: Ontario (except National Capital Region)

### Tender Description

The Guelph Research and Development Centre of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, requires the supply, delivery, installation, and training of one new benchtop pulsed light system for use in food safety research and development. The successful bidder must submit their bid and supporting documentation by December 15, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST.
